channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Learn Python & AI Agent Development
item.content:encoded: Master Python programming and AI agent development with this comprehensive bundle from Zenva. Inside this 25-course collection, you'll get hands-on experience building AI apps with DeepSeek, creating autonomous agents with CrewAI, and developing practical projects like meme generators and speech-to-text web apps. This bundle equips you with essential skills in Python fundamentals, web development with Flask and Django, data visualization, and cutting-edge AI implementation techniques. Progress from coding basics to sophisticated AI applications whether you're a complete beginner or mid-journey developer, and support technology education initiatives with your purchase!

item.title: Sounds for Adventure - A TTRPG Audio Bundle
item.content:encoded: The mysterious & mighty tunes of a dark fantasy soundtrack have never been closer—create the perfect audioscape for your Dungeons & Dragons game night with the Sounds for Adventure Bundle. This audio-based bundle is designed to enhance your D&D campaigns with thematic tracks like Battle Music Vol 3: 50 Battle Scores, Dark Fantasy Vol 1: 50 Dark Scores, and more. Get everything you need to elevate your D&D experience and help support Care.org with your purchase.

item.title: The 2025 AWS, CompTIA, Azure,Google Cloud, and NVIDIA Certification Bundle
item.content:encoded:
A new career is only a test or two away—our 2025 AWS, CompTIA, Azure, Google Cloud, and NVIDIA Certification Bundle has everything you need to study and prep. Get over 300 hours of expert-led content 420 full length practice exams and over 21,000 exam questions plus tons of Humble Bundle first time launch exclusives you will not find anywhere else. Ace your certification exams and help support Care.org with your purchase!

Mammoth Interactive has re-branded to MammothClub. Please note, all new courses will be on their new platform at MammothClub.com. For valued returning students, your existing courses are linked to your email and will be imported shortly. Their new site has achievements, AI tutors, and more.

item.title: Music for Dummies
item.content:encoded: The professionals from the For Dummies series are back again to help you unleash your inner musician. Learn a variety of digital instruments with in-depth lessons like Singing For Dummies, Guitar For Dummies, and Piano For Dummies. Track how you’re doing in real time—this 10 course bundle offers beginner and advanced courses for you to progress through. Take your passion for digital music to a new frontier and help support Care.org with your purchase.

item.title: Legendary Game Dev Environments Bundle
item.content:encoded: Game developers—it’s time to build new and unique worlds with this bundle of 5000+ legendary game assets from Leartes Studios! This high-quality collection features environments, models, animations, and more for use in Unreal Engine and Unity. Recreate the post-WW2 Era with the 1950s NYC Environment Megapack. Build a mighty castle setting with the Fantasy Castle Environment. Or curate your own magical garden lands with the Stylized Paradise Gardens. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Care.org with your purchase!

item.title: Skills Hub: Get that Promotion
item.description: Big promotions only a bundle away
item.content:encoded: The Growth Mindset should be at the forefront of every career-minded individual. With hot courses like Winning at Sales and Managing Conflict—the Humble Skills Hub: Get That Promotion Bundle is a one-stop-shop for go-getters. This 20+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to take your career in sales, marketing, and more to the next level. Take your passion for productivity and growth to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase.

item.title: Become a 3D Artist - Mega Tutorial Bundle
item.description: Creativity unlocked with a digital paintbrush
item.content:encoded: Unlock new beauty of creating vast digital worlds—Artists, it's time to become a 3D artist with this outstanding bundle of tutorials from FastTrackTutorials! Our high-quality collection features 30+ tutorials focusing on environments, characters, models, textures, and more for use in Unreal Engine, Unity, Blender, Zbrush and many more. Get the education you need to bring your art to life, and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

item.title: RPG Maker Beyond Expectations Bundle
item.description: The magic of RPG Maker unleashed
item.content:encoded:
Love RPGs? Start making your own with the all new RPG Maker Beyond Expectations Bundle by Gotcha Gotcha Games. Unlock your creativity through the powerful medium of video games—you’ll be surprised how user-friendly RPG Maker is too. Within this amazing bundle, you’ll gain access to premium engine tools like RPG Maker Unite, Pixel Game Maker MV, RPG MAKER VX Ace, and more! Feel the freedom of expressing your personal style through game development—show off your love for anime, high-fantasy, steam-punk, and more. Make your own games and help support Extra Life with your purchase!

Check out the RPG Maker 2025 Game Jam here!

item.title: The Best of Synty Game Dev Assets
item.description: Turbo charge your game dev skills
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build amazing worlds with this bundle of Synty polygon assets and more! Bring your projects to life quicker and make your dream game a reality while supporting a great cause. Synty assets are fully customizable and easy to use, making them accessible for game developers of all levels. *Compatible with Unity and Unreal game engines—this high-quality collection features environments, characters, meshes, models, animations, and more for use. These Synty game dev assets are sure to inspire beginners and seasoned developers alike!
